statement: The tone of the message should be more:

less.label: Direct
less.description: Make the text more concise and straightforward, focusing on the message's purpose without small talk.

more.label: Warm
more.description: Add warmth and conversational elements, using open-ended questions and friendly language.

statement: The humor level in the message should be more:

less.label: Serious
less.description: Keep the message focused and free of jokes, maintaining a serious and professional tone.

more.label: Humorous
more.description: Incorporate light humor and casual language to make the message feel relaxed and approachable.

statement: The level of formality should be more:

less.label: Casual
less.description: Adopt a relaxed, friendly tone that feels informal and approachable.

more.label: Formal
more.description: Use a professional tone, including proper etiquette and formal language for a more polished message.

statement: The context of your last interaction should be more focused on:

less.label: Current Connection
less.description: Focus on the present interest in reconnecting, rather than dwelling on past interactions.

more.label: Past Experience
more.description: Reference positive shared experiences from the past to build familiarity and warmth.

statement: The relationship with the person was more:

less.label: Distant
less.description: Maintain a friendly tone without becoming too familiar, appropriate for a less close relationship.

more.label: Close
more.description: Include references to shared memories and express a genuine sentiment that suits a close relationship.

statement: The time since your last contact should be acknowledged as:

less.label: Short
less.description: Briefly acknowledge the recent gap in communication without placing too much emphasis on it.

more.label: Long
more.description: Openly acknowledge the longer gap with warmth, ensuring the tone is friendly and understanding.

statement: The goal for reconnecting should be more:

less.label: Casual
less.description: Keep the tone light and conversational, suitable for a casual catch-up without a specific agenda.

more.label: Purpose-Driven
more.description: Start with a personal touch before introducing a specific purpose for reaching out, such as networking or an event.

statement: The level of emotional openness should be more:

less.label: Reserved
less.description: Maintain a neutral emotional tone, focusing more on general updates than personal reflections.

more.label: Open
more.description: Express genuine emotions and reflections to create a more personal and heartfelt connection.

statement: The pacing of the message should be more:

less.label: Quick
less.description: Keep the message brief, getting to the point quickly without extra context.

more.label: Gradual
more.description: Take a gradual approach, providing additional context to ease into the conversation naturally.

statement: The level of specificity in the message should be more:

less.label: General
less.description: Stay broad in details, allowing room for interpretation and follow-up questions.

more.label: Detailed
more.description: Include specific details to show attentiveness and interest in particular topics or events.

statement: The message should acknowledge past challenges more:

less.label: Minimally
less.description: Avoid any difficult topics of the past, keeping the tone neutral and forward-focused.

more.label: Openly
more.description: Acknowledge any past challenges or tensions directly but with warmth, showing understanding and empathy.

statement: The message's call to action should be more:

less.label: Subtle
less.description: Gently suggest a follow-up or next steps without applying pressure.

more.label: Clear
more.description: Make the call to action direct and specific to convey confidence and interest in reconnecting.

statement: The message should show curiosity about their updates more:

less.label: Minimally
less.description: Keep questions to a minimum, allowing them to respond only if they feel comfortable.

more.label: Eagerly
more.description: Express a high level of curiosity about their recent updates to encourage open sharing.
